question: I have multinodular goiter--largest nodule in Aug 09 was 3.2x 1.7 on right side.  local ENT wants to remove right side right away.  biopsies in June 09 revealed two cold nodules--ent says that test is sort of a dinosaur and are not always accurate.  I am having it removed mid january.  My question is:  thyroid problems, can they be related to the pituitary tumor I had removed almost seven years ago?  I only have residual pituitary tissue left and have deficiencies with Growth Hormone and have developed diabetes since pit surgery as well.Thanks for any answersChrissy
title: multinodular goiter after pituitary tumor
